data.title: What's On In Durham
data.text:
A major outdoor art installation, inspired by England’s oldest stained-glass windows, has been unveiled on the exterior of Auckland Tower in Bishop Auckland. Following a nationwide and rigorous selection process, the installation has been created by Bristol-based artist and illustrator James Gibbs and nine arched panels taking inspiration from St Peter’s Chapel at Auckland Castle […]

The post Stained-Glass-Inspired Art Installation Debuts at Auckland Tower appeared first on Durham Magazine – Your Source for Durham News. Courtesy of Durham Magazine – News …

Mr. Sly is a British artist known for his mixed media collages and contemporary interpretations of 20th Century pop culture. His bold, graphic images have become his unique trademark. With a background in photo restoring and graphic design, Mr. Sly meticulously blends these talents in his artwork. Producing both limited edition prints and original pieces, […]

The post Discover Mr. Sly’s Bold Collages and Contemporary Pop Culture Art appeared first on Durham Magazine – Your Source for Durham News. Courtesy of Durham Magazine – News …

A room dedicated to a horror character has opened at The Manor House Hotel, West Auckland. The Eve Suite opened on Monday (8th July) in honour of Eve Valentine a character brought to life by award winning film director Dean Midas. Fans of the character can immerse themselves in Eve’s history and folklore. Dean was […]

The post Eve Valentine Takes Over Manor House Hotel with New Themed Room appeared first on Durham Magazine – Your Source for Durham News. Courtesy of Durham Magazine – News …

The Zumtobel Group lighting brands Thorn and Zumtobel and contractor Lytestream devised a comprehensive lighting solution for Darlington Library that seamlessly blended heritage preservation with modern functionality. Darlington Library, originally known as the Edward Pease Free Library, is a testament to the town’s rich historical and cultural heritage. Built in 1885 with a later extension […]

The post Historic Darlington Library Shines with Modern Lighting from Zumtobel and Thorn appeared first on Durham Magazine – Your Source for Durham News. Courtesy of Durham Magazine – News …

Visitors are invited to step back in time with two new exhibitions showing the giant prehistoric monsters that once roamed the UK and Europe. Carboniferous Monsters will be at Bishop Auckland Town Hall this summer until Saturday 31 August. Situated in the Durham County Council venue’s main gallery, visitors can step back to the Carboniferous […]

The post Explore Prehistoric Giants at Bishop Auckland Town Hall’s New Exhibitions appeared first on Durham Magazine – Your Source for Durham News. Courtesy of Durham Magazine – News …
